thread.title: Equestrian Lovers Can Win Over $40,000 in Prizes, Horseland Launches 'New Season New Reason' Competition
thread.title_full: Equestrian Lovers Can Win Over $40,000 in Prizes, Horseland Launches 'New Season New Reason' Competition - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Equestrian Lovers Can Win Over $40,000 in Prizes, Horseland Launches 'New Season New Reason' Competition
text:
Horseland
Horseland is giving its customers the chance to win big prizes with every purchase through their "New Season New Reason" competition. There are over $40,000 worth of prizes at stake, including a Pinnacle horse float valued at $17,000.
VICTORIA, Australia , Oct. 5, Horseland, Australia's leading equestrian supplies retailer, is celebrating the start of the spring season by launching their "New Season New Reason" competition. Customers are given the chance to win prizes, worth over $40,000 , over a span of 8 weeks.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151002/273550
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151002/273551
This special promotion was launched on the 27th of August, 2015 and will conclude on the 21st of October this year. Kym West , Online Marketing Coordinator at Horseland says, "We love to spoil our customers and this is one way we do it. Joining is really quite simple. All they have to do is make a purchase at any of our Horseland stores nationwide or through our website, register the purchase online, and they'll have the chance to win one of our amazing prizes."
The prizes for this competition will include Designer Brand Cosmetic Gift Bags valued at $33 each for 432 winners; then six winners will receive $2,000 BP Fuel Card each, and the grand prize will go to a single customer: a Pinnacle Horse Float, valued at $17,000 .
"It's our way of saying 'thank you' to our customers for all of their years of loyalty to our stores. As we strive to be the heart of the equestrian community, we feel this is the perfect way for us to give back," adds Ms. West.
The Marketing Coordinator points out some important reminders about the competition:
To enter, a customer must purchase any product or products from Horseland stores (including from the online store) during the promo period. Entrants must then go to the Horseland website ( http://www.horseland.com.au/ ) and follow the link to New Season New Reason Competition, then enter the transaction number from their receipt. Entries must provide all requested contact details, including a valid email address, to be eligible to win. Entrants must enter in their own name only. One entry per purchase transaction. All entrants must retain their original receipts, documents or tags to validate proof of purchase during the promotional period. In addition to this promo, Horseland offers benefits year-round with the 'Rider Rewards Club', where customers can earn points each time they shop. Gift cards, lay-by, and saddle fitting services are also available.
To find out more about the New Season New Reason competition, and for the full terms and conditions, visit the promotion page at http://www.horseland.com.au/nsnr/about .
About
Horseland, founded in 1978, is Australia's largest equestrian retailer with 54 stores. A successful family-owned and operated business offers quality horse equipment for sale . Products for riders, horses, stable and vet, dogs, as well as gifts are available at their website. Their vision is to be the "Heart of the Equestrian Community" and their mission says it all: "Whether it's finding out what's on, knowing who to talk to, showing you how or just being understood, Horseland provides horse lovers with hints, tips, advice and experiences to realise the full potential of you and your horse."
Contact:
Name: Kym West , Online Marketing Coordinator
Phone: +61 1800 021 980
Email: Email
